available().details: Custom logic in here for how much the vault allows to be borrowedSets minimum required on-hand to keep small withdrawals cheap

params._depositToken: The address of the deposit token of the vault
params._manager: The address of the vault manager contract
params._vaultToken: The address of the share token for the vault

params._amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

setGauge(address).details: Allow to be unset with the zero address

setMin(uint256).details: min is the minimum percent of funds to keep small withdrawals cheap

setTotalDepositCap(uint256).details: totalDepositCap is the maximum amount of value that can be deposited to the metavault at a time

params._shares: The amount of shares to withdraw

available().notice: Returns the amount of tokens available to be sent to strategies

balance().notice: Returns the total balance of the vault, including strategies

balanceOfThis().notice: Returns the balance of allowed tokens present on the vault only

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits the given token into the vault

earn(address).notice: Sends accrued 3CRV tokens on the metavault to the controller to be deposited to strategies

getPricePerFullShare().notice: Returns the rate of vault shares

getToken().notice: Returns the deposit token for the vault

setGauge(address).notice: Sets the value of this vault's gauge

setTotalDepositCap(uint256).notice: Sets the value for the totalDepositCap

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraws an amount of shares to a given output token

withdrawAll().notice: Withdraw the entire balance for an account

withdrawFee(uint256).notice: Returns the fee for withdrawing the given amount

userdoc.notice: The vault is where users deposit and withdraw like-kind assets that have been added by governance.
